name: CVC Word Magic: Montessori Reading Game for Kindergarten Phonics Mastery, Learn to Read & Write 50 Sight Words for Toddlers 2-4 Years, Montessori Toy for 2+ Year Old, Letter Tracing Tiles, Flash Cards
short_description: Learn to Read in Weeks: this interactive Montessori CVC word reading game will keep your kids engaged and learning for hours! Includes 26 wooden letters and 50 double-sided phonics flash cards with beautifully hand-painted, realistic illustrations.

Rooted in The Science of Reading: kickstart your child's literacy journey by cultivating basic phonics skills like phonemic awareness and decoding. Watch them trace and slide their way to sight word reading success while segmenting and blending fun CVC words like "fox" and "bat".

Durable and Eco-Friendly: with laminated CVC flash cards and grooved premium beechwood letters for enhanced sensory learning, this Kindergarten reading game is durable for daily literacy adventures—and good for the planet too!

Build Reading Confidence with Multisensory Phonics: watch struggling readers blossom as they trace, slide, and blend their way to phonics mastery using the moving slider and grooved letter tiles—perfect for building phonemic awareness in tactile learners and children with dyslexia, dysgraphia, or autism.

Science-Backed CVC Reading Magic: this game aids orthographic mapping by transforming CVC words (like 'cat') from sounded-out segments (/c/-/a/-/t/) into instantly recognized sight words through tactile tracing, sliding and blending - proven to boost phonemic awareness and early reading fluency!

What's Included: this kindergarten phonics game consists of a wooden blending board with slider for decoding, 26 color-coded beechwood letter tiles for spelling and tracing, 50 double-sided CVC flash cards and a premium giftable box for easy storage.

name: Phonics Learning Toy for Preschoolers – Phonics Flash Cards with Talking Pen, Speech Therapy & Autism Sensory Toy, Learn to Read Educational Gift for Boys & Girls,Kindergarten Learning Activities
short_description: 【Learn to Read Starts with Phonics】- This reading pen set includes 75 flashcards with 592 words and 148 simple sentences, guiding children through a step-by-step phonics learning journey. The included scan reader automatically recognizes words on the cards and prompts kids to pronounce aloud and practice repeating them—all without needing downloads, making learning interactive and hassle-free.Once Hooked on Phonics, Kids Can't Stop Chasing Word Magic!

【Designed & Recommended by Teachers】- The phonics card game is systematically structured into four progressive levels. Level 1 focuses on CVC words and alphabet mastery. Level 2 advances to short vowel sound recognition, helping learners decode simple words more confidently. Level 3 combines consonant clusters with fluency building; Level 4 delves into advanced blending with vowel pairs, enabling smooth and accurate reading of complex words.

【Speaking & Recording Function】- When the scan reader is placed over a flashcard, it instantly recognizes the content and plays standard pronunciation. Kids can press the record button to capture their own speech,and this real-time feedback system helps them identify differences, correct articulation, and build confidence in speaking—all while sharpening listening skills through interactive practice.

【Speech Therapy Autism Sensory Toy】 - Each card features research-backed visuals—vibrant, kid-friendly illustrations that pair with the scan reader’s audio prompts, creating a multisensory learning experience. Studies show this approach boosts engagement by 65% in early readers, enabling children to confidently read 100+ words within 3 months.

【High Quality for Long-term Use】- 4"x6" cards made with 300gsm matte paper and rounded edges are toddler-safe and easy for small hands to hold. Includes 4 sorting rings and 6 interactive stickers—tap with the scan reader anywhere for on-the-go learning. Sturdy and playful design ensures long-lasting fun.

name: LeapFrog Mr Pencil's Scribble Write and Read, Green
short_description: Your new pal, Mr. Pencil shows kids how to write uppercase and lowercase letters step-by-step, then transforms the letters into animated animals and more
Trace numbers by following the dotted lines, then watch them transform into objects you can count
Customize by entering a child’s first, middle and last name so they can practice writing it
Sound out new words by sliding Mr. Pencil across the screen and the sound-it-out bar lights up to follow along
Intended for ages 3+ years; requires 3 AA batteries; batteries included for demo purposes only; new batteries recommended for regular use
product_description: Play with a pal who has all the write stuff in the Mr. Pencil’s Scribble, Write and Read. Follow Mr. Pencil's lead! Use the stylus and trace the dotted lines to write numbers, lowercase letters and uppercase letters. Then watch the letters transform into animated animals, objects and more. The numbers transform into objects that equal the number’s value. Tap Mr. Pencil on them to count each one. Pencil perfect! Find letters to build words and explore early spelling skills. Complete a new word and sound it out. Slide Mr. Pencil across the screen, and the bright lights of the sound-it-out bar follow along as you go. Add personalization by programming a child’s first, middle and last name. Kids can then practice writing the words they’re most familiar with—their name! Mr. Pencil loves to draw. Watch him draw a picture using dotted lines and then trace over it. Kids can also follow their own creativity and free-draw anything they can imagine. That was fun, let’s play some more! Intended for ages 3+ years. Requires 3 AA batteries. Batteries included for demo purposes only. New batteries recommended for regular use.
